Package tp.checkers.client

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
tp.checkers.client.GameService
public class GameService
extends java.lang.Object
Class handling the game in the side of client.

    • GameService

      public GameService​(ClientConnector client, Window window, Field[][] fields, java.awt.Color color, int baseSide)
      Default constructor of the class.
      Parameters:
      client - reference to the client connector
      window - reference to client's window
      fields - array of fields of the game
      color - color of the player
      baseSide - number of pieces in one side of the base
